author: Max Proprawe
name: codebeamer-miro

scripts.prebuild: (IF exist dist ( RD /s /q dist ) ELSE ( print 'a' )) && MKDIR dist && COPY src\index.html dist && COPY src\settings.html dist

description: This is a codeBeamer <-> Miro integration web-plugin to be installed on Miro. It allows to import codeBeamer items to a Miro board, displaying any associations between the items.
